flawed_nl_solution:
Dave weighs 175 pounds and can bench press three times his body weight, so he can bench press 175*3 = <<175*3=525>>525 pounds
Craig can only bench press 20% of Dave's 525 pounds, so Craig can bench press 0.2*525 = <<20*0.01*525=150.0>>150.0 pounds
Craig bench presses 150.0 pounds and Mark does 50 pounds less than Craig, so Mark can only press 150.0-50 = <<150.0-50=100.0>>100.0 pounds

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 105.0, not 150.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
